name: opWin - Investigate Market Information, and Evaluate Your Strategy
tagline: showcase of a TAIEX Quant application
body: ### Easy Market Information Update * One command updates all ### View and Compare Information In Any Period * Zoom-in/Zoom-out to browse market information in any period from 1993 * Investigate two TAIEX information simultaneously ### View and Compare TAIEX and Stock Information Simultaneously * Compare selected stock information with TAIEX * Any pair of daily/weekly/monthly/quarterly information can be viewed in unified time period ### Efficient Strategy Backtesting * Large amount of information (>100M) can be handled in seconds in a virtual environment * Backtesting result is presented in terms of net asset value, yearly ROR, sharpe ratio, monthly ROR distribution, ..., and many others. ### View and Compare Backtesting Results with Market Information ### Technology python: * Unified data retrieval for various raw format (csv, htm, xls) * Three-level cache hierarchy: from ungrouped raw format to grouped binary pickle format * Unittest framework by mocking qt/qwt: * Portable pure GUI application * Real-time data visualization * Seamless strategy specification, evaluation, and result comparison Boost: Python binding, serialization Google Test: Smoke testing framework
